729366f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Road - Spring Street
729366f-a.text:
955 Richmond Road, adjoining the N. . corner
of Spring Street, showing the Clinch House, part of
which was built about 1780 by Garretson. The view
is north.
Spring 1925
P. L. 3perr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729366f-a.folder: Richmond Road & Spring Street, Staten Island, NY
